name: Goblin Gunslinger
text: You have learned how to fire the big guns.
benefit: You can wield Medium firearms without taking the penalty for an inappropriately sized weapon.
normal: You take a –2 penalty when using an inappropriately sized weapon.
staminaText: When wielding a firearm that deals fire damage, when you threaten but fail to confirm a critical hit, you can spend 5 stamina points to regain 1 grit point. You still can’t gain a grit point if the target is immune to critical hits.
text_zh: 你学会了如何使用大枪射击。
benefit_zh: 你可以使用中型火器而不会由于使用越型武器而受到罚值。
normal_zh: 当你使用越型武器时受到-2减值。
staminaText_zh: 当你持用造成火焰伤害的火器时，当你重击威胁却在重击确认中失败时，你可以消耗5点耐力来回复1点勇毅。如果这个生物免疫重击你仍然无法获得勇毅。
